name: Moshal-Social
description: An exclusive social networking platform dedicated to the Moshal Scholarship Program, designed to simplify and enhance connections among scholars within the community.

name: Boggle
description: A Python-based variation of the classic Boggle board game, enhanced with the tkinter GUI library for an engaging interface. This iteration includes unique features and employs intelligent algorithms to elevate the gaming experience.

name: Eagle-Vision
description: A React-based web application employing Clarifai's API for face detection. It incorporates essential components like a robust database, user authentication, and a dynamic ranking system.

name: Fruitty
description: An interactive React app for fruit enthusiasts! Discover and store your preferred fruits, easily modify their nutritional information, and efficiently manage your favorites list.

name: Portfolio
description: Crafted from scratch, my Portfolio showcases my design skills and experience seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile. It's all about having a blast while browsing!
